price: Kae εberε a mo Wura Nyankopͻn de too dwa sε: “Sε moyi (Me) ayε a Mede bi bεka mo ho; na mmom sε moyi (Me) boniayε a, εneε nokorε sε, M’asotwee ano yε den papaapa.
arabic: وَإِذۡ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكُمۡ لَئِن شَكَرۡتُمۡ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمۡۖ وَلَئِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ إِنَّ عَذَابِي لَشَدِيدٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ta-adhana rabbukum la-in shakartum la-azīdannakum wala-in kafartum inna ʿadhābī lashadīdun
